NODE.name: sockets
NODE.help: List of sockets (urls) that apteryxd will accept connections on.
Unique identifier based on HASH(url). Value is the url to listen on.

NODE.name: watchers
NODE.help: List of watched paths and registered callbacks for those watches.
Unique identifier based on PID-CALLBACK-HASH(path). Value is the path.

NODE.name: providers
NODE.help: List of provided paths and registered callbacks for providing gets to that path.
Unique identifier based on PID-CALLBACK-HASH(path). Value is the path.

NODE.name: validators
NODE.help: List of validated paths and registered callbacks for validating sets to that path.
Unique identifier based on PID-CALLBACK-HASH(path). Value is the path.

NODE.name: proxies
NODE.help: List of proxied paths and remote url to proxy gets and sets to.
Unique identifier based on PID-HASH(path)-HASH(url). Value is the full url for the path.

NODE.name: cache
NODE.help: Formatted dump of the Apteryx cache

NODE.name: counters
NODE.help: Formatted list of counters and values for Apteryx usage
